name.ch: 跨領域課程設計與實作

goal.ch:
“中華民國教師專業素養指引-師資職前教育階段暨師資職前教育課程基準
3-2 依據課程綱要/大綱、課程理論及教學原理，以協同規劃發展跨領域/群科/科目素養導向課程、教學及評量
3-4 掌握社會變遷趨勢與議題，以融入課程與教學。
3-5 應用多元教學策略，以促進學生有效學習。“
goal.en:
“3-2. collaboratively design single/interdisciplinary curriculum based on general/subject curriculum guidelines
3-4. inclusion trends and issues in curriculum and instructions
3-5. improving effective learning by applying multiple teaching strategies“

outline.ch:
“(1)學科領綱的內容理解(包含學科本質的認識與理解)。
(2)素養的認知與自我想像。
(3)教育政策的變遷與差異化整理。
(4)跨領域的學科思維(大概念)的認知。
(5)現象覺察的能力。
(6)跨領域課程發想與議題結合之關鍵因素。
(7)總綱與學科領綱核心素養。“
outline.en:
“1. general ＆ subject curriculum guidelines
2. definition and imagination of competence
3. the enactment and transformation of educational policy
4. the big concepts
5. the identification of the phenomena
6. the key factors of combining interdisciplinary Curriculum development and related topics“
7. core literacy in general guidelines of 108 curriculum
